channel.title: 508 client help
channel.description: i need help on my p server when ever i open it asks me for my ip how do i edit so it wont ask me for my ip. or how do i make a client so i can give it to other people and they don't have to enter the ip. :mad:

item.title: 508 client help
item.dc:creator: @Multiscape Multiscape
item.description:
@Multiscape wrote:

  1. Open client.java.
  2. Go to the bottom of it.
  3. Look for something like this:
    Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null,“Please enter IP address:”);
  4. Change it to:
    Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = “yourserverip”;
  5. Compile.
  6. Complete.

Read full topic
